description:
Description
This is the same data as in 'pancreatic', with overall and progression-free survival calculated. Dates have been removed.
title: pancreatic2

parameters.status: This censoring indicator is 1 for all patients, since all patients died.
parameters.stage: a factor with levels LA (locally advanced) or M (metastatic)
parameters.os: Overall survival: Time from entry until death
parameters.pfs:
Progression-free survival: Time from entry until disease progression. 
If no progression was observed, before death, the time to death is used.

format: A data frame with 41 observations on the following 4 variables.
